title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 – NBA Champion Robert Horry
itunes:title: Dan Patrick - Hour 3 – NBA Champion Robert Horry
description:
In hour three of The Dan Patrick Show, Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre start with the NBA and pose a question: was game 1 of the Nets and Boston series the best game so far? The Warriors are officially back according Doug. Plus, NBA vet and 7x champion Big Shot Robert Horry joins the show to talk playoffs, the Lakers coaching search, and more!

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
